```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
betting <- read_csv(here::here("esselt21/soccer_bet_module/exploration/betting.csv"))
```

```{r}
bettingClean <-
  betting |>
  select(HomeTeam, AwayTeam, FTR, AvgH, AvgD, AvgA) 
```

```{r}
bettingClean <-
  bettingClean |>
  mutate(Prediction = ifelse(AvgH < AvgD & AvgH < AvgA, "H",
                             ifelse(AvgD < AvgA, "D", "A")))
```
